Package org.opennars.io.events

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EventEmitter.EventObserver<C>
    Observes events emitted by EventEmitter
    OutputHandler.DEBUG
    debug statements, enabled through Debug.java
    OutputHandler.ECHO
    explicitly repeated input (repetition of the content of input ECHO commands)
    OutputHandler.ERR
    warnings, errors & exceptions
    OutputHandler.EXE
    operation execution
    OutputHandler.IN
    implicitly repeated input (a repetition of all input)
    OutputHandler.OUT
    conversational (judgments, questions, etc...) output
    TextOutputHandler.LineOutput
